About Me

HiðŸ‘‹! I am a last year Ph.D. student at the Massivizing Computer Systems Group, supervised by Alexandru Iosup. My research focuses on applying data science and machine learning techniques to understand and support datacenter operations.

Research Interests

  • Operational Data Analytic
  • ML/LLM for System Operatoins
  • Datacenter Ontology
